text: @NCDCgov @Fmohnigeria @FMICNigeria @DrEOEhanire @AfricaCDC @WHONigeria @OfficialOSGFNG Today, listening to Dr Sanjay Gupta on CNN, I understood that those that recovered from covid-19 may still have the virus in their nose and throats for some days and are advised to stay home as much as possible or wear face masks in public places. Can .@NCDCgov respond to this?

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
